Reviews.Title: Really pleased - great value for the money
Reviews.Author: Sioban Lanigan "Irish Crone"
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. I did not want another Android. I have an IPAD for wifi. I want a cell phone to be a cell phone but I am one of those who MUST have a qwerty keyboard. The keyboard is great, the phone is reliable and easy to use and the display is good too (I need a good display for my vision). The battery lasts well too.(I should warn you that Boost's website does not have any ringtones for the phone which is just bad website design really and Boost blocks purchases of ringtones elsewhere) - hopefully Boost will fix it soon but,of course, that is not the fault of the phone. And Boost monthly plans beat the competition by far. This Samsung phone is really good buy,I recommend this purchase.

Reviews.Title: best prepaid phone thats not a smart phone
Reviews.Author: robert j schulten
Reviews.Content: Was prompt on delivery of phone, and the phone has some nice features even though not a smart phone, slide out keyboard was nice and easy to use, and boost being on sprint network works really when for coverage. If your not into the smart phones, this is the smartest phone for you.

Reviews.Title: Reviewing after my grandma bought this for me, please keep looking
Reviews.Author: Chicago Girl <3
Reviews.Content: This phone is OKAY. Being a teen, its definitely not that fun to use.Web: Is okay, even though I could get on fb and twitter the small screen just  took the fun out of it. It was kind of a hassle going on fb trying to like and comment things but overall I would give this feature 2/5 stars.Texting: With the keypad, it's pretty easy to text but over time I started not receiving peoples texts.Since I text a lot, I guess it wasn't a good thing because it kept telling me to delete some of my messages so I could receive more. I'm not sure whether it was the company or my phone service but I would have conversations with people through text and I would be the last one texting. Really annoying. 3/5Calls: I can hear fine through the phone, but people were complaining sometimes that they have to say hello twice before I say it.3 way calling is kind of confusing also. I got a lot of dropped calls while calling my friend. 3/5Battery/ Life: It only lasts a day if I'm being a normal teen on it. But if I just text it lasts about a day and a half. Literally have to charge my phone everyday. Not to mention the charger that came with it began to not work. The wire messed up. 2/5Music: Is OKAY, if you love to listen to music like me this may not be the phone for you. Its very annoying when I try and add on music and there are no options of changing anything about the song once it's on your phone. I also tried to delete a song from a playlist I made and it ended up deleting it from my phone period! Navigating trying to find a song you want to listen to is a hassle too, you have to use the arrow pad and constantly press up or down. Good luck if your song starts with a y. Oh yeah, The music turns off when you go into other apps. 3/5Camera: It's better than I thought, it may be the best feature on the phone. The camera zooms, it does collages, you can take pictures at night, and also does video. The only thing I don't  like is that you cant edit the photo on your phone. After you take it, it is what it is. 4/5Memory: I dont really remember how much memory was on the phone but whatever it was, it wasnt enough for me. I had to buy a micro sd card because I love to take pictures and have music with me while i'm out. In order to put things on the phone you need a micro sd card. I still ran out of memory after buying an 8gb card.Apps: There really arent any apps on here, you can pay your boost payment from the phone, gps, and there is a store to buy things and that's about it. Nothing that really interests me.Games: They could have put more games on here, I mean c'mon there's not much else on this device. The only FULL games on here that you can play are Family Feud and Tetris I think. The others you have to buy and  are only a demo. 2/5Other things I didn't cover: I saw someone commented on ringtones saying you can't download them, that is true. The phone looks okay, being my age I wouldn't take this phone out in clear sight where everyone could see it. This phone is also DURABLE, I dropped this phone a lot (more than 5 or 6 times) but then it finally broke when I dropped it in the toilet. Once you get the hang of the calender it's pretty nice to use but it will be confusing. I kind of miss my Motorola theory, I had more freedom with that phone.Overall this phone is just basic and I think is not meant for teens. It will have a long life and be more beneficial to someone older who just wants to talk and send occasional texts.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG ARRAY (BOOST MOBILE)
Reviews.Author: ANDRE VAZ
Reviews.Content: I am very happy with this device which works perfectly fine and has been attending accordingly my needs.  Thank you

Reviews.Title: Super Boost Cellphone
Reviews.Author: Sportman16
Reviews.Content: This phone is easy to use, I like the flip out letter pad. I use it to talk, text and play Pac-Man. I am glad I made this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Yvonne
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. The only thing I am not fond of the phone keeps locking. I can't stand to keep unlocking the phone.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Star McMuffin
Reviews.Content: I got this phone LAST YEAR and its still in amazing conditions, I have gone 2 days without charging and yes I'm addicted to my phone so I'm on it 24/7 I'm 12 so I would rather an iPhone. But who wouldn't? So all in all this phone is awesome I have 200 songs and 100 pictures/videos and a nice case, I'm kind of reckless and probably have dropped it a million times and spilt water on it but it's still working fin. I recommend to anyone who wants a cheap durable phone :)

Reviews.Title: Great First time Phone for my 10yr old
Reviews.Author: Sandy C. Jourdain "Kindle Lover"
Reviews.Content: Nice and Durable. the Hard keyboard is the best! I prefer Hard keyboard over touchscreen. good product. will get another for my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Useable!
Reviews.Author: s. francis725
Reviews.Content: I mean if your looking for a phone that makes calls and texts easy! This is the one to go for!

Reviews.Title: Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The item was just as I expected sleek, reliable, and simple. I have had no trouble with the phone since I received it last year. I mainly use it to call and text. The delivery was within the promised date. I would recommend it to those who use for simple, everyday usage and no horns/whistles, low price.

Reviews.Title: pay as you go
Reviews.Author: Erica
Reviews.Content: If you have a pay as you go plan( the 20cents per minute no contract plan) then this phone is one of the compatible for that price. my child likes to text and the flip phone with no key board was difficult. I don't want to buy a phone contract when hes always with an adult so this is a cheap alternative.

Reviews.Title: samsumg array prepaid phone is just okay.
Reviews.Author: aida davila-roldan
Reviews.Content: how can I change it for a i phone 5c by boost?  d o I have to enter a boost store for purchase? and a trade in? your answer is most important thank you.

Reviews.Title: Great Voice & Text Option
Reviews.Author: MD90
Reviews.Content: My wife has been stuck on the slider phone design for years now and was devastated when her old Samsung M350 Seek died.  I ordered this as a temporary replacement until we found something better.  After a few weeks, I found a used but like new replacement M350.  I asked if she would like to switch back to her old phone and she said the new Array had grown on her and was fine.  It took a week or two but the phone actually performs great.  Voice conversations sound clear, good signal in most areas and excellent battery life.  It feels well made and doesn't look bad either.  Don't expect to do much in the way of taking pictures or viewing media.  It will view and send picture messages fine but forget internet use.  If you need a reliable phone for voice and a real keyboard for text, this is an excellent choice.

Reviews.Title: could use it
Reviews.Author: CINDY JARAMILLO
Reviews.Content: I got it it was okay until it was two weeks later when the phone broke I didn't know why it broke

Reviews.Title: Nice !!!!
Reviews.Author: Jackie Brady "mjjfan58"
Reviews.Content: Samsung is by far, my most favorite cell phone maker....I have the Samsung Galaxy 2 4g and this one i purchased for my daughter. Samsung makes a great product. wil definitely buy this brand in the future.

Reviews.Title: My wife new phone
Reviews.Author: Howard Rackley
Reviews.Content: My wife needed a new phone that would make texting easier and the samsung fit the bill she has come to enjoy her new phone

Reviews.Title: Does what I need.
Reviews.Author: Sandi  K.  Walker "Sandra K. Walker"
Reviews.Content: Great buy for the money.Paying only what I did I got a lot.Simple little Samsung Prepaid phone for only what I need it for.

Reviews.Title: it works, but not happy
Reviews.Author: Frank Scaturro
Reviews.Content: Its generally fine and it is usuable. The only thing that bothered me, was the old digital text menu display. Seemed like Samsung gave up when it came to that part.

Reviews.Title: WILL NOT SEND PICTURES
Reviews.Author: Lorie-Ann
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE IS A FAILURE. I AM GOING BACK TO VERIZON. THE PHONE WILL NOT SEND PICTURES. SUCH A WASTE!

Reviews.Title: No Charger
Reviews.Author: Letty
Reviews.Content: The Phone package was open when I received it and there was no charger with the phone when I purchased the phone it did not mention that it did not have a charger there where other phones and they did say no charger came with the phone the phone is in good condition but unfortunately I will have to buy a charger which defeat the purpose of buying a used item.

Reviews.Title: Bluetooth is finnicky
Reviews.Author: Charles W. Harper
Reviews.Content: This phone is a pretty good phone except for one big deficiency - it doesn't like Plantronics headsets.  Even with the phone in your breast pocket the connection will break up or disconnect. I paired two different Plantronics headsets, M-25 & M-155, with them and both worked badly.  They were flawless with other phones.However, the phone worked great when paired with my S305 headphones and my Blueant Q2 headset.

Reviews.Title: Too many glitches
Reviews.Author: Healthy Smile
Reviews.Content: Querty keyboard is nice. But, some pictures are too large to send out. It may take days to recieve a picture mail text. Phone does not hold a charge. Calendar sometimes goes off for events months ahead of time.

Reviews.Title: Array prepaid
Reviews.Author: Donna Corothers
Reviews.Content: Could not transfer all my picture on it. not enough power. Need a little more then that.Don't like it at all.  thanks

Reviews.Title: cost effective
Reviews.Author: SlimDoug
Reviews.Content: For the price, it's hard to bash this phone. The texting IS slow, but not horrible. But it's hard to give this phone more than 3 stars, even with the price in mind.

Reviews.Title: Most useless cell phone I've every purchased
Reviews.Author: stephanie rusch
Reviews.Content: No apps work with this. Why it takes a 32 gig micro sd chip is beyond me. It will play music but I cant get it to load any of my photos or even download ringtones or wallpaper. What a total waste of money.

Reviews.Title: shoulda known better
Reviews.Author: MsBapp
Reviews.Content: I can't get this antiquated phone to hook up to my car's hand free system. I will donate it to charity.

Reviews.Title: This phone can be trouble.
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: The phone looks nice, and the qwerty board is good. But those aren't what makes up a good phone.  I like to customize my phone with my own ringtones and pics.  This phone does not allow that.  The pics I already had on the memory card I inserted from another phone, the software did not recognize, nor did it recognize the ringtones that were there. I was stuck with the rather lame ones that came with the phone.  And the volume of the ringtones was scarcely audible; and that with them turned up to the phone's maximum.I bought this phone prepared to like it, as I wanted this particular form factor.  But I was very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Not A very good phone for it's time
Reviews.Author: djthirst
Reviews.Content: Well this phone is outdated if U ask me for how new it is. It only has 2G network, the camera is more like a 1MP instead of 2. Its not wi-fi compatible, and it likes to get SOOOOOOO hot it actually pops up with a message saying phone is overheating and shuts down on U when doing extreme stuff on the web with it. Got really hot in my hand. Most of the games on it are demo's and ill try to make U pay for full versions of game. Tetris I think was the only one full on there. It does play MP3's nice, but that's about the only nice thing I can say about this phone. it sounds good with headphones. No since in recording with it too since mine doesn't record with sound and look like crap anyways. Using it as a phone itself was a joke. it also too overheat when talking to long. The customer service was a joke too,they didn't believe me, said there was nothing wrong with the phone. So yeah I wouldn't recommend this phone to no one, and is very disappointed that Samsung would make such a sh**ty product.

2MP Camera ? Camcorder

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Array Prepaid Phone (Boost Mobile)
